basics.name: David Coxon
basics.label: Lead Web Software Engineer
basics.summary: Versatile developer with strengths in architecture and web technologies. Great team player who can also deliver independently. Confident in leading other engineers. Dedicated to keeping it simple and making other developers' lives easier.

work.summary: Driving modernisation of web apps and development practices
highlights: Delivered rebuild of complicated legacy application in React, published as a web component.
Architected and implemented an integration layer to replace a legacy application without breaking its legacy client-facing APIs.
Championed practices such as mono repos, componentisation and automated UI testing.

work.summary: Senior developer on high profile, OpenFin based trading platform.
highlights: Helped design and lead part of a major technical revision.
Designed and implemented a process for seamless upgrades of client's OpenFin runtimes.
Responsible for outward facing APIs and integrations of applications onboarded onto our platform.
Oversaw years as primary on call engineer without a single major incident due to timely mitigations and understanding of the company's wider infrastructure.
Trained multiple new joiners and graduates.

work.summary: Formerly Lockheed Martin. Worked on a diverse set of software projects across the transport sector.
highlights: Implemented a rest api and web front end for Air Traffic Control scheduler, which sends flight departure information to EuroControl.
Crunched radar data to calculate fees for civil flights in UK Aerospace.
Integrated algorithm to optimise Heathrow runway usage.
